p.s: In the following, I'm going to comment on the film The Hate U Give with the aspect what impact it had on my life, perspective and my ideas.

But this doesn't make you a bad person!
We're literally all from the same flesh and blood.
I don't get what some people makes them even think racist in any possible way.
The Hate U Give represented this topic in a great way and makes you think about it more often.
